attributes.comment:
Each provider and hospital should be required to update their profile monthly, or anytime they make a change in the practice. This should supersede any requirements to update other lists or directories.

Other important elements to consider:

-Their delineation of privileges (what they can offer at their local hospital/ clinic)
-Each hospital and facility where they have admitting privileges.
-Group affiliation and practice details.
-Status: Full -time, part-time, contractor, locum tenens, etc.
-Age and years in practice
-Link to their CMS open payments profile
-Data history. Ability for patients to see tend to bounce from one job to another.
-Ability for users to flag and alert CMS of data inaccuracies.
